title: 1146 58 "An Imminent Threat - Stussy and Edison's Resolve"Transliteration: "Osoi-kuru Kyōi - Sutyūshī to "Ejison" no Ketsui" (Japanese:襲い来る脅威 ステューシーと｢想｣の決意) Shō Inuzuka Ryo Yamazaki Kenji Yokoyama October 19, 2025(2025-10-19) 2.8%[60]
